name: Reading Chinese: China from the Inside Out
description: Intended for students who are able to read everyday publications, e.g., newspapers in either complex-form characters or simple-form characters. Pinyin, complex-simplified character conversion and vice versa, and fluency are emphasized through reading and discussing advanced materials in a variety of topics from and outside of Greater China, presentations, and essay writing.
exclusions: LGGB66H3. The instructor has the authority to exclude students whose level of proficiency is unsuitable for the course.
